Yandex Disk.name: P03b.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose all the types of user information it infers on the basis of collected user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P03b.02
Yandex Disk.description: For each type of user information the company infers, does the company clearly disclose how it infers that user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P03b.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it limits inference of user information to what is directly relevant and necessary to accomplish the purpose of its service?
